steps.name: Given I have a basic Deployable
and a basic DeployableContainer qualified as 'server' that uses the image test/my-image:6.3.2 and exports port 8081
But the timeout for the deployment is set unrealistically low to 1 second
And there is a 3 second delay when waiting for the pod
When the controller processes a new TestResource

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a controller developer, I would like to specify how my image gets deployed providing only the essential configuration so that  I can focus on my development tasks
